name: A Very Serious Chaze
description:
I made another little platformer, trying out a few things with more visual scripting!
There's sounds and music this time!
This was for an assignment to design build a level! it's very basic, but I like it! it was done in a short time frame.

If you can't play it through the Web browser, there's a file you can download to play it on your pc instead.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controlls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

*Note;You can move around with a controller but sadly it's more snappy movement than smooth.
